thread.title: Japan's domestic auto sales fall 3.0% on year - MarketWatch
thread.title_full: Japan's domestic auto sales fall 3.0% on year - MarketWatch

author: Megumi Fujikawa
title: Japan's domestic auto sales fall 3.0% on year - MarketWatch
text:
TOKYO--Japan's domestic sales of new cars, trucks and buses declined 3% from a year earlier in September, the Japan Automobile Dealers Association said Thursday.
Sales totaled 305,802 vehicles, the association said.
Separately, sales of mini cars in September fell 14.7% from a year earlier, Japan Light Motor Vehicle and Motorcycle Association said.
Monthly sales of mini cars, with displacements of 660cc or lower, totalled 173,573 vehicles.
Auto sales, as measured by registrations of vehicles with the government, are monitored by economists since they are the first indicators of consumer spending released each month.
Web site: http://www.jada.or.jp; http://www.zenkeijikyo.or.jp
Write to Megumi Fujikawa at megumi.fujikawa@wsj.com
